articles.content: Xiaomi has confirmed the existence of the Mi TV Stick. Leaked by @Sudhanshu1414last month, Gearbest has been advertising the Mi TV Stick for US$79.99 since at least May 15. According to the listing, … [+1365 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 20+ spotted on 3C with 25W fast charging support - 91mobiles
articles.description: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 and Galaxy Note 20+ are expected to launch in August alongside the Galaxy Fold 2.
articles.content:
Samsung Galaxy Note 20+ will succeed the Galaxy Note 10 line-up.
